title: Drawing, "Sketches from Rome, Italy", January 1869
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at center left: cool; and at center right: yellow.
description:
Recto:  Horizontal distant view of St. Peter's Basilica and the Vatican with a few clouds visible in the sky.
Verso:  Horizontal view of a group of trees whose tops are not visible at the left and a part of a tree trunk at the top right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sketches from Rome, Italy", January 1869.
January 1869. Graphite on tan wove paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-157.
